tn.ref: what was right in the eyes of Yahweh
tn.text: See how you translated this in [[:en:bible:notes:2ch:14:01|14:1]]

tn.ref: all the days of Jehoiada, the priest
tn.text: AT: "as long as Jehoiada was alive" (See: [[:en:ta:vol1:translate:figs_idiom]])

tn.ref: Why have you not required the Levites ... covenant decrees?
tn.text: "You have behaved wickedly. I told you to require the Levites ... covenant decrees, but you have not done it." (See: [[:en:ta:vol1:translate:figs_rquestion]])

tn.ref: for the tent of the covenant decrees
tn.text: Although it refers to the temple that Solomon built, it is a reminder that the "tent of meeting" was the first holy place for the people of God.
This refers to the items used in the temple.
AT: "those who built with stone and those who built with wood"

tn.ref: continually for all the days of Jehoiada
tn.text: AT: "everyday during the life of Jehoiada" (See: [[:en:ta:vol2:translate:figs_hyperbole]])

tn.ref: ignored the kindness that Jehoiada, Zechariah's father, had done to him.
tn.text: Joash did not pay attention or remember the great kindness of Jehoiada, Zechariah's father.
AT: "you will pay for the wrong you have done"

tn.ref: Zabad son of Shimeath, the Ammonitess; and Jehozabad son of Shimrith, the Moabitess
The Commentary on the Book of the Kings
tn.text: This is a book which no longer exists.
